attrib:
RADIUS: 400 / 400 / 400 / 400
DURATION: 4
DAMAGE: 100 / 175 / 250 / 300
MOVEMENT SLOW: 25% / 35% / 45% / 55%
ATTACK SLOW: 25% / 35% / 45% / 55%
cmb:
MANA COST: 90/105/130/150
COOLDOWN: 13
desc: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.
lore: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.
name: brewmaster_thunder_clap

attrib:
DURATION: 8
MOVEMENT SLOW: 14% / 18% / 22% / 26%
MISS CHANCE: 45% / 55% / 65% / 75%
cmb:
MANA COST: 50
COOLDOWN: 8
desc: Drenches a small area in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.
lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!
name: brewmaster_drunken_haze

attrib:
DODGE CHANCE: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
CRIT CHANCE: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
CRIT DAMAGE: 200% / 200% / 200% / 200%
desc:
Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage.
The guaranteed critical attack and guaranteed dodge chance are on separate timers. (each timer=16/14/12/10 seconds)
notes: Does not stack with evasion from other sources.
lore: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.
name: brewmaster_drunken_brawler

cmb:
MANA COST: 125/150/175
COOLDOWN: 140/120/100
desc:
Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
The Earth Element will carry all auras that the Brewmaster has, as well as True Sight.
When the spell ends, Brewmaster will take the place of an element in this order, assuming they are alive: Earth, Storm, Fire.
lore: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.
name: brewmaster_primal_split
